pou.name: _ST_G_InitIsNull_AllSimpleTypes
pou.sourceSTIL:
if IsNullREF(gr_bVar) & IsNullREF(gr_byVar) & IsNullREF(gr_diVar) & IsNullREF(gr_dwVar) & IsNullREF(gr_iVar) & IsNullREF(gr_liVar) & IsNullREF(gr_lrVar) & IsNullREF(gr_lwVar) & IsNullREF(gr_rVar) & IsNullREF(gr_siVar) & IsNullREF(gr_strVar) & IsNullREF(gr_tVar) & IsNullREF(gr_udVar) & IsNullREF(gr_uVar) & IsNullREF(gr_ulVar) & IsNullREF(gr_usVar) & IsNullREF(gr_wVar) & IsNullREF(gr_wcsVar) then gtest_init := TRUE; end_if;
FailIf(gtest_init = FALSE);
